Hello,

I have a question about Heritrix 3 behavior : what happens if two s=
eeds have the same authority and the quota is based on the group?

Due to t=
he AssignementPolicy (SurtAuthorityQueueAssignmentPolicy), the two seeds sh=
ould be added to the same queue. Is there any garantee that the two seeds w=
ill be crawled 'efficiently'? (i.e. that the quota will not be only used fo=
r one of them.)

From what I understand Heritrix could crawl the first seed=
, go over quota and then try the next one but it would be too late. (Assumi=
ng that force retire is set to false.)

As a practical example, the two see=
ds could be
http://yahoo.com/business/
http://yahoo.com/mobile/
In that fic=
tional case, we would want to crawl only the business and mobile parts of t=
he yaho.com site but not the whole domain (which could be very huge).

Is t=
hat a scenario that is likely to happens? What would be the best way(s) to =
prevent it?

Thanks in advance

Bertrand Dechoux
